verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:29
verses.text: For I know that after my death ye will utterly corrupt yourselves, and turn aside from the way which I have commanded you; and evil will befall you in the latter days; because ye will do evil in the sight of the Lord, to provoke him to anger through the work of your hands.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:30
verses.text: And Moses spake in the ears of all the congregation of Israel the words of this song, until they were ended.
